channel.title: India Tech Atlas
channel.description: Explore India's tech ecosystem across past, present, and future eras with interactive games and insights.

item.title: Past Hub: Foundations of Indian Tech
item.description: Explore the institutions, policies, and pioneers that seeded India's computing, electronics, and space capabilities.

item.title: Present Pulse: India's Tech Momentum
item.description: Track the living heartbeat of Indian technologyâ€”digital public infrastructure, unicorn creation, chipset ambitions, and SaaS champions going global.

item.title: Future Forge: Imagining India's Next Leap
item.description: Craft speculative scenarios from quantum stacks to resilient climate tech. Tune moonshot ingredients and map how Bharat might engineer inclusive breakthroughs.

item.title: Games Lab: Interactive Indian Tech Playground
item.description: Spin up startup mashups, test your instinct on funding numbers, and unscramble desi tech terms. Everything celebrates the creativity powering India's tech boom.
